name: Warzone Wiki Dark Theme
description: Makes Warzone's wiki have a dark theme and fixes some other Warzone visual issues.
additional_info:
Version: 1.2.5.
Changes summary:
1.2.5: - Fixed bug that prevented content from using all of the available space.
1.2.4: - Bug fix.
1.2.3: - Made lists on the Wiki have a white bullet.
1.2.2: - Bug fix.
1.2.1: - Make all the available space for the main site content used.
1.2.0: - Made style only work on Warzone's wiki.
1.1.4: - Bug fixes.
1.1.3 - Layout of code.
1.1.2: - Bug fixes.
1.1.1: - Made it only apply to WarLight.
1.1.0: - Formatted practically everything with an Id / Class.
1.0.1: - Bug fixes.
1.0.0: Made available to use
